attributes.action: Self employed worker's ask for bailout to survive during this covid 19 outbreak
attributes.additional_details:
Self employed driver's are struggling to survive the outbreak of covid 19 and there are literally no customers to sustain.
Some workers are valnables to the desease due to the fact they have pre medical condition or age and forced to stop work.
We urge to the government to take urgent actions and bail us out.
attributes.background:
The Coronavirus outbreak has impacted many self employed and zero hour workers into financial crisis as a result they're forced to either stop work or spread the desease.
We're requesting the government to fund us until the outbreak of covid 19 is over.
